concept.name: abstract (Properties or qualities as distinguished from any particular embodiment of the properties/qualities in a physical medium.)
quantity (Any specification of how many or how much of something there is.)

attr.obj: abstract (Properties or qualities as distinguished from any particular embodiment of the properties/qualities in a physical medium.)

concept.name: physical quantity (Physical quantity is a measure of some quantifiable aspect of the modeled world.)

attr.obj: quantity (Any specification of how many or how much of something there is.)

concept.name: constant quantity (A constant quantity is a physical quantity that has a constant value.)

attr.obj: physical quantity (Physical quantity is a measure of some quantifiable aspect of the modeled world.)

concept.name: function quantity (A function quantity is a physical quantity that is returned by a function that maps from one or more instances of constant quantity to another instance of constant quantity.)

attr.obj: physical quantity (Physical quantity is a measure of some quantifiable aspect of the modeled world.)

concept.name: unit of measure (A standard of measurement for some dimension.)

attr.obj: physical quantity (Physical quantity is a measure of some quantifiable aspect of the modeled world.)

concept.name: composite unit of measure (Instances of this class are units of measure defined by the functional composition of other units, each of which might be a composite unit of measure or a non composite unit of measure.)

attr.obj: function quantity (A function quantity is a physical quantity that is returned by a function that maps from one or more instances of constant quantity to another instance of constant quantity.)
unit of measure (A standard of measurement for some dimension.)

concept.name: non composite unit of measure (Instances of this class are units of measure that are applied to a single dimension, and so are not intrinsically defined by the functional composition of other units.)

attr.obj: constant quantity (A constant quantity is a physical quantity that has a constant value.)
unit of measure (A standard of measurement for some dimension.)

concept.name: systeme international unit (The class of Systeme International (SI) units.)

attr.obj: unit of measure (A standard of measurement for some dimension.)
